reviewText: You will not be able to use a SIM card with this unless you pay for Apple to install the necessary hardware. I was quoted nearly $300.
Wouldn’t read my T-Mobile SIM card
Worked slow, barely charged.
Will be returning, 73% battery life, very disappointed as Amazon guarantees at least 80%.  Wish this was checked before it was sent out
Why can’t I get a signal and I am not receiving any calls
When we got the phone right from out of the box the charging port is not working properly so that is also the headphone jack in one. We basically can’t use it until I get the charge jack replaced.
When I ordered the phone, I ordered it for my 4 yr old. When I tell you the battery life was HORRIBLE, it was HORRIBLE!!! I sent the phone back.

When i got it - first thing i did was try to charge it.Apple logo show up - then goes away again. ... then this repeats ... again and again .. I've tried several times to Restore or Reset the phone - via iTunes - No luck... its just a brick :-(

When first turned on the phone it said corrupt battery and when I messaged them about it they got back to me once just asking for certain serial numbers and after I gave them to them they never got back to me and now dealing with a bad battery which is getting to be very frustrating. Don’t purchase from them because they guaranteed about 90% battery but this was way below that and did nothing to help or replace it or anything!

What I liked about this phone is the price for $150 not too bad. But I just spent an additional $49 for insurance. The one thing that I was concerned about with this phone is that the seller was not very honest about how many scratches were in back of the phone. Good thing for having a case. We will never see those scratches. Returned phone software didn’t work.

We have had the phones (I bought two of them) for a couple weeks. The first phone stopped working within the first week. The second all of a sudden stopped today. Won’t turn on nothing. So $300 wasted and now I have to buy new phones. I am beyond mad at this point.
Was a gift to my granddaughter. She did not have this iPhone 6 months before it stopped working. Phone will not charge anymore.

Unfortunately I bought this phone in September and at the beginning of January it did not pick up the network again, it did not allow me to update it, I bought the simcard 3 times and nothing ... currently I changed companies thinking that it was the operator and today that I try it I get no it serves!! I am so sad and disappointed because I thought that because I bought it on Amazon it would last longer, unfortunately it does not work!

This was scam. everything looked good at first. We got an iphone 7 128gb and compatible with verizon. However, It was not compatible with verizon at all. Now i am hoping to get a refund. I do't think they will give it to me though. So please save yourself the trouble and shop elsewhere.

This was for personal use the phone has been nothing but trouble since the day we got it. Will not make calls or will make calls on its own we don’t even when we’re not even trying. Need to know if there is insurance on this purchase Or is there any kind of warranty on this purchase
This was a foreign phone. Not compatible with the cell system in the United States. It probably would’ve worked perfectly in Europe.

This phone was purchased for my grandson and after only one week the charger end broke. I tried charging it with my IPhone charger and it wouldn’t charge. The phone quit charging even before the charger end broke. How do I return this for a refund?
this phone was not unlocked, so what's the point?

This phone was great for a couple of months.  Then, one evening the phone started shutting off/restarting independently.  I looked up the problem on the internet and came to the conclusion it was the battery.  I took it to the local computer store and ordered a new battery.  The technician told me the protective plate that holds down the battery was missing and whoever refurbished this phone put a piece of tape inside the phone.  Also, it came with a screen protector on it.  The case I put on the phone won’t fit with this protector so I took it off.  The technician told me the screen was warped when he put the new battery in it.  I will never buy another refurbished phone!!!!
This phone was completely locked. Couldn’t figure out the carrier for it!
This phone was actually not fully unlocked, it was not compatible with Verizon. I have requested an exchange, in hopes that this was just a glitch.
This phone is very bad and healthy battery no good and lot of scratches noooooo gooooooooddd

This phone does not work. It’s great to watch movies or send texts but as a phone call, it does not work you cannot hear sound over it whenever anyone calls they can’t hear me and I can’t hear them. Definitely not a well refurbished phone. I would not buy from this vendor.
This phone did not work!It doesn’t connect to our phone SIM card and can only be on WiFi. It was also broken at opening where the SIM card goes in. I am extremely disappointed!!

This phone came earlier then expected.. but in checking I noticed that the charging port was not working... I contacted the seller and tried all they told me to get the charging port up and running but it’s still not working I won’t recommend anyone  to buy this product..... it’s a waste of money and waste of time

This is not the first renewed phone I have purchased from amazon and typically they are like brand new phones with less battery life but for some reason this particular phone I am having all kinds of problems. From the first seller I chose the phone I received looked brand new but had a dreadful battery under the advertised 80 percent and needed to be replaced so I sent that one back and ordered another one from another seller. This second phone has decent battery life but looks like complete and utter crap. The casing is scuffed and pitted everywhere and the screen is horribly scratched. If you are going to buy a renewed phone I would try a newer product.

This is bad quality phone doesn’t work to connect with another company and it’s battery life is 81 %

The worse I never bought. Battery is dead and I sent it in Africa, so no way to return it. Just lost my money. I could give 0 star

The T Mobile iPhone 7 that I purchased from this company turns on and charges, but could never be activated on my T Mobile plan. After three months of trying, going to T Mobile stores in Vermont, Massachusetts and New York, it could never be activated for data use. It is basically, an I Pod. After reaching out to the company about it, they reassured me the phone was fine. It isn’t. I missed the return window by a few days; they said they would not do anything to assist me with a refund or exchange. I suggest finding another way to buy a used phone. Don’t use this seller.
The stop working in 2 weeks
The sim tray was defective and the supplier/Amazon did nothing to help .

The seller I bought from (Electronic Deals) sent me a phone with 69% battery health.  Even though the Amazon description clearly says 80% or above.  The health dropped to 68% the next day, and then wouldn't even hold a charge.  If they're not even simply checking if a number in the settings is above 80% (a simple yes or no), then you have to wonder if they're really inspecting these at all.  These phones are good prices and it's easy to return them, but still annoying for it to be sent without passing a simple inspection check and potentially leave people without a phone another few days while they return and wait for a new one.  I highly recommend everyone to check the battery health right when you receive the phone before you waste your time installing stuff/setting up.

The product worked only told slightly outside return date.  My product was returnable til 06/07/21. Last week 07/15/21 my phone was unable to connect to my data any longer. I found this out to be a common problem with the 7’s.  We took it in and because the original purchase date of phone was 2016 it fell outside of apples warranty for the issue (4yrs). And also I’m 5 weeks outsid Amazon’s warranty.  So now I have a phone they can only be used on WiFi. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED

However, after the 30 day return window (of course) the phone has been having all sorts of problems. I have audio issues with my phone on speaker, the keyboard gets stuck constantly, and the battery life is pretty much non-existent. Incredibly pissed I bought this for 230$ and now can only get 60$ if I sell it back. Just a warning, but if you buy your phone from here you are gambling with your money honestly. So just do a payment plan through your provider or get it from apple and spare yourself the frustration

I've boughten iPhones from amazon before, two different iPhone 6s. This time, I could only find iPhone 7, so if figured "why not?". I'll tell you why, this seller sent a defective phone. It worked perfectly the first day, and then 24 hours later it told me I needed to update it or else my cellular data wouldn't work (which means I could not receive or send any texts or calls!). Sure enough, I updated it, and it worked, for another few hours, until it said it needed ANOTHER UPDATE! Unfortunately, it was already up to date as it could be. So I took it in to the "geniuses" at APPLE, and they said THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH iPhone 7, YOU NEED TO REPLACE IT. And that was it. Returning, hopefully that goes smoothly. Avoid iPhone 7, too sketchy.

I was unaware when I bought this phone that Apple had recalled all IPhone 7s for a “no service” error. Unfortunately, I encountered this error and was unable to connect it to service which completely defeated the point of me buying it. I ended up having to buy an iPhone 11 from Walmart, which costs a little more than this phone did. I recommend choosing a different phone as this was most definitely not worth the money or time I spent trying to set it up.

I want my mom back it doesn’t even work

I received the iPhone 7 at the end of January 2021.  Forty-five days after the 90-day return window had had expired the phone started crashing constantly and wouldn't work at all unless it was plugged in.  I tried all of the troubleshooting tips I found online to no avail.The same day, I noticed that the screen was bowing away from the case and I was not able to push it back together.  I took the phone apart and found that the battery was swollen.  When I looked into this I found that is can be extremely dangerous due to outgassing and risk of fire.  When I contacted Kiss Electronics they refused to offer any assistance whatsoever because I was outside the 90-day window.Customer service is a choice.  There are always options and ways a seller can accommodate and assist their customers. Kiss Electronics not only sent me phone with a dangerously defective battery, they offered no assistance whatsoever to rectify the situation.I would not recommend buying from them.

I really wanted to live this phone snd I was SO excited to receive it. When I powered it on it was charged to 90%. I started setting it up and it got REALLY hot really fast. Within 30 minutes it had dropped from 90% to 56%. The more I used it I noticed the touch screen is super unresponsive also. In the 11 hours I have had this phone I had had to charge it 3 time and it just will not hold a charge.

I purchased this phone received a damage scratchy phone...I was to get a $25coupon from the seller to purchase a case but I couldn't get to removed the feed back comment by doing so, the phone battery life last for 1hour and half it take charging for 10 days now it completely stop working.for me to return this phone I will be paying the $185.65 three times to return plus have to pay to collected it when it returns....this was the worst mistake I ever made purchasing this phone ...I need my money back didn't get my money worth smfh.

I bought this phone for my husband because of the storage and its promise to be "like new". When we first received the phone, we were annoyed to find that the front camera didn't work and the battery only lasted an hour or two before dying. After 4 months of owning the phone, it completely stopped working. Would not receive or make calls and couldn't send texts unless connected to wifi. We took to the Apple store and they said that this model was discontinued because of this issue, and there was nothing they could do. My husband ended up having to buy a completely new phone. I wouldn't purchase from this seller as it was promised to be "like new" and it obviously was not.

I bought this for my mom for mother’s day. She just opened it to connect service. She can hardly hear the other person on the line. The speaker for phone calls is junk. Her fault for not connecting it sooner but the seller could stand behind their product. They refuse to exchange phone. I do not recommend buying from someone unwilling to exchange a faulty product.

At first I thought needed to update and restart phone and maybe different charger so I used an actual iPhone charger, updated it and restarted it. It did not help. However the phone looked brand new. As soon as I turned the phone on, it started heating up rapidly from within. In less than 5 minutes I couldn’t even hold it. I didn’t even finish setting it up. I unplugged it, turned it off, and am sending it back ASAP. Even the adapter was too hot to handle after a few minutes. An hour after I powered it down, I went to put it back into it’s box, and the thing was STILL hot. Very scary. I’m obviously disappointed, I was looking forward to having a new phone.
All of a sudden it says no service and then starts shutting on and off and now I have to order a new phone. Only had this phone for about a month. waste of money
After reading description, I felt the device would fit my needs.After getting the phone, I found the description was WRONG. My phone was not unlocked. It’s nothing but an expensive paperweight to me.

After my phone arrived, I had a few issues with the speed and with the brightness of the screen. However, as I was leaving the country the following month - I had no time to waste on sending it back and waiting nearly a month from a company that never returned my calls.So, here I am not even a full year later AND it will not connect to wifi or cellular data. For the 3rd time since I have had it since August 2020.Would not recommend purchasing, too many problems.

After being using my Iphone 7 for one year and 3 months, suddenly it didn't recognize the SIM card and it was impossible to restore it by any way. I took it to the apple o mac representative and I was informed that it is an issue that came with all Iphone 7.  Now my iphone is completely  useless.
After a few months the phone stopped working it won’t turn on

A1660 Apple recall on cellular service capabilities.  Phone became inoperable within 24 hours of receipt.  Took to Apple store; no fix available, tried to sell me a new phone.  Very upset teenager.  Counting on vendor BuySPRY's good customer service to process refund quickly.  Looking for another refurbished IPhone that does not conk out like this
A bad phone
Worked fine for about a month and then it started saying it needed to update but no update was available. Took it to get looked at and it can’t be fixed! Waste of money!
With normal use.. Battery dies  twice as fast.

When the phone arrived it was loose in the box. It appeared ok so I didn't send it back. I bought it in April at the beginning of the pandemic with very limited choices to buy a phone and my old phone was not working. I contacted the seller letting them know how the packaging was in case of problems later with no response. I have had many problems with the phone. I contacted the seller again with no response. I would not recommend this seller,

When I received this phone, the first thing I noticed is that the speaker was really low. I was not able to hear phone calls very well.  Now, 8 months after I purchased it, the speaker has completely gone out.  I can't make phone calls at all!
When I received the phone the battery life has 1% meaning it had a bad battery. Waiting on response now.
When I plug in the charger to the port, it feels very lose. The battery life is mediocre as well it can be on 50 percent and half an hour later its on 17.
When I got this phone for my son it had a sound problem and every time he wants to talk on the phone it’s bad audio please give me a refund
Well first of all, when I opened the box, there were already 2 cracks on the phone. I’ve reached out to the seller twice & no one will respond. The battery life is not good.

We purchased this phone for my daughter with the intentions of getting her a phone line when she got a bit older.  In the meantime, I allowed her to use it like a tablet.  7 months later, when we went to get it activated it was not fully unlocked, and she could not get service on it.  I sure wish we would have checked it sooner.  The seller would only give 50% back at that point if we returned the phone, charger and box.
We have already had to spend $85 to replace the main screen componant, so I can't give this phone a good rating.
Way to many scratches and it gets hot very quick. I understand normal wear and tear but this one is just way out of line.
was a great phone until something in the motherboard did not allow the cell phone to have service.
Very low quality and slow
Upon receipt the iOS had what I first thought were quirks but unfortunately turned out to be critical flaws.

Unfortunately, the unit I was given had a degraded battery. Even though I don't use it much and I almost do not have any apps installed, the battery won't last too long. I probably wouldn't buy from this seller.
Too small in size

This was a great phone and all, but once I got outside of the 90-day protection period I noticed a few problems coming gout of the woodwork. First the battery started not charging slower and with a little less time on a full battery, which I honestly thought would happen earlier on. However that hasn't been the only problem, now it makes a very loud sounds middle of calls and the in-call speaker randomly emits extremely loud burst of static, screechings, and whistles that have left my ear ringing and unable to finish calls. If its not making those sounds in my ear, it usually doesn't make any at all. My mic picks up my voice, but I can't hear anything, not even on speakerphone.This may have been a bad on out of the batch, but if you have money to buy something better I'd say to consider it. Unless you want to use it as an "Ipod".
This phone, after a year, started having problems. The camera doesn’t focus well anymore and it is starting to have image retention. Be careful buying! Battery life is starting to dwindle too.
This phone worked great but after 3 months the sound completely stopped working.

This phone will cost at least $50 more than it appears to. After less than 4 months, the battery is “significantly degraded”. The battery was charging and losing power very quickly. I found out why a few weeks after the Amazon 90-day return expired. It is not covered by an Apple warranty either. Amazon must have known this when they sent me the phone.
This phone was purchased a couple of months ago and went out right away.  We recovered it now it is totally out and Apple said on recall due to malfunction.  Trying to get it replaced.
This phone was not fully unlocked and only works for Verizon. It happens to be fine in this case because my friend decided to switch to Verizon instead of returning the phone.
This phone runs really slow and the battery life is awful. Will buy new from actual phone company in the future.

This phone is almost perfect!!! The only thing about this device is that I can’t get it turned on due to the fact that it won’t accept a SIM card. I found this misleading due to the fact that they told me my device was renewed and compatible with certain carriers.
This phone does not work properly I am returning it

This phone arrived two days ago and I just got a chance to open it. The battery only have 6% of power, and it can't be charged! Either the phone or the charger has some problem. When I charge the phone, it keeps connect & dis-connected by itself. Why are you sending me a phone that is defective?
This iPhone arrived with the warning on the battery that the battery needed maintenance totally unsatisfied
There is no update instruction, we had to call to customer care to get the instruction and battery is poor

There are times when a phone is set to support another carrier, and even after a full factory reset, any carrier update will kill your mobile network.  Happened to me.  Sprint/T-mobile reset it and tried multiple times, and every time we got it to work, it would lose full mobile connectivity in less than a day.That means no calls, no text, no internet if you're outside of wifi.Be warned and keep your old phone handy.  You may be disappointed like i was.
The works fine and just this previously Verizon phone was suppose to be fully unlocked. It’s not
The unlocked phone would not up to my company’s system. It kept stating I needed to get an update but the phone was updated to 14.4. I returned it for a full refund.
The SIM card slot was broken

The shipping was slow, and the phone that I received was not silver as advertised it came in white. There was no pen enclosed as it advertises. If I wanted a white colored phone or no other accessories it would have been great. Was able to get it set up and working right away after it came.

The seller did not respond to the phone number or email included on the card that came with the phone. We have had troubles with the battery not holding a charge, it needs to be plugged in all the time. It also had troubles with the screen which appear to be a little bit improved. We need the seller to respond or we will just update this review to a one star.
The screen was scratched at the top left cornerAnd the back side has  seberal white spots.Bad condition !!
The product arrive damaged on the back and corner
The phone would not accept a charge after only 3 weeks.. Hardware issue. An even exchange would have been fine but now they want $25 more.

The phone won't stay charged for more than 5 hours. I had it at 100% and sitting on a desk not being used, and it was down to 3% by 4:30pm. I reached out to seller and asked if he could send another one so my kid wasn't phoneless and then when I got the new one, return the original and if it wasn't returned, he could charge for both. Never heard back.
The phone will randomly die after being charged.
The phone was in great shape physically, but could not hold charge at all. Had to return within minutes of opening it. My daughter was very disappointed.
The phone simply drops its signal. Do not recommend.
The phone only works if you have on AirPods ☹️

The phone looks new and there's no scratches unlike other people comment but the thing is that when I charge the phone it's getting hot and the battery don't last. I just used it for like 10-15 mins and it's already half of the battery life and it's getting hotter and hotter when you used it. I returned it anyways coz I'm afraid that the phone might explode while I used it or I charge it. I'm soooo disappointed coz this is my first iphone and also this is the first time I ordered through online. Lesson learned but its a great experience though. I hope this will help those people who's thinking of buying a refurbished phone. My advise is that always rethink coz not everyone is lucky to get a good phone like the other says in the comment.

The phone looks great. However, the battery life was 70% instead of the promised 80%. This means that the battery dies very quickly, even when fully charged. We attempted to contact the seller but received no response. We would have settled for an exchange, but again, no response. Looks like we have to buy a battery, add another $50 to the price to get a fully refurbished phone. Very disappointed.
The phone looked good function well but was defective it had something loose inside and I had return it
The phone is very bad does not charge and runs out of battery fast
The phone is defective. I was able to upload my things through iCloud now the LCD screen is not working. So now I am unable to remove my personal information.

The phone in itself looked GREAT, and worked well, however the battery life was severely lacking. Dying every two hours. The battery health in the settings said the battery needed replaced and with Apple would’ve been $80 after already paying hundreds so I sent It back. The company was really great and fast about giving a refund!
The phone has really really poor battery performance. I’ve never ha this issue with a renewed item before.

The phone had a bad battery that would only last for about 4 hours. Because I was in a situation where I couldn’t wait for a return, I had to get the battery replaced at my expense. When the technician opened the phone there was clear damage to components on the inside. One component looked like it came out of a phone that had a battery fire. If I wasn’t in a pinch I would have returned it in a heartbeat.
The phone doesn’t work. I can hear a person I call, but they can’t hear me.
The phone constantly restarts itself. The battery lasts all of 10 minutes. I do not recommend buying a phone from this company.. they’re junk.
